ygData.subject: RE: Broken Song
ygData.msgSnippet: Again, this doesn t even fix that problem if that was the original intent. Using one cast of normal levitate my druid can bounce up into that
ygData.messageBody:
Again, this doesn't even fix that problem if that was the original intent.
Using one cast of normal levitate my druid can bounce up into that
crawlway/ventilation shaft without any exploits. All they really had to do
to fix it was put an Ice Giant Dwarf Spawn in there. That would wreck
somebody's day.

Kitasi
commenting on Draffut the druid
> Doh... someone probably read the thread on this list I posted
> a long time ago about how to sneak into Vox's lair, when I
> first figured it out without using the surface geometry to
> 'scale' a flat wall (as someone pointed out). Uups.

> Harmonic.
